name: Basic Attacks
description: Fundamental attack qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: Powerful Strike
qualities.description: Your attacks hit with exceptional force. Add +2 damage to all damage-dealing attacks.

qualities.name: Precise Targeting
qualities.description: You can target weak spots with deadly accuracy. Add +1 accuracy to all attacks.

qualities.name: Multi-Strike
qualities.description: You can attack multiple targets in a single action. When making a melee attack, you may target up to 3 adjacent enemies with the same attack roll.

qualities.name: Ranged Mastery
qualities.description: Your ranged attacks are exceptionally effective. Increase the range of all ranged attacks by +2 and add +1 damage.

qualities.name: Critical Focus
qualities.description: You can focus your attacks for maximum impact. Once per battle, you may declare a critical hit before rolling. That attack deals double damage.
